name: The search for the Bird Treasure.
name_original: The search for the Bird Treasure.
description:
The dangerous birds have an incredible treasure, and if anyone wants to get to the treasure you are going to have an adventure to do. Do you have enough guts to take the quest?

This game was made by clickteam fusion 2.5 and the graphics were made by the ms paint.

Instructions:

This game has 3 levels, one of them is a boss

To move, you have to press the arrow keys

To jump, you have to press the up arrow key while moving

To attack, you have to press the Q button. 

Have a good time with the game!
